Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Musashi, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan was making drastic shifts from tradition to modernization under political ideology.
